dict.string:
Hides recently deleted photos while still retaining stock "Recently Deleted" functionality. Hides your recently deleted photos by making the "Recently Deleted" folder show "0" & "No Photos or Videos" when opened. Simply disable this patch to reveal the folder contents again. Useful if you don't want your deleted pictures easily seen but still want to use the "Recently Deleted" feature.
* This patch differs from the patch "No Recently Deleted!" since this ONLY hides recently deleted photos from view, ...it doesn't stop photos from moving into the folder.
[v.1] Tested with iP6+ 8.4. (9-30-15)
★ If you enjoy my patches, please consider sending a donation...

Hide Recently Deleted Photos (Stealth Mode) ₉₋₃₀₋₁₅
